quote.quotepara: [drlvm][classloader] 'clss' field is never cached for TypeDesc struct ----------------------------------------------------------------------

Key: HARMONY-3840 URL: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HARMONY-3840 Project: Harmony Issue Type: Bug Components: DRLVM Reporter: Mikhail Fursov Assigned To: Alexey Varlamov Attachments: java_types.diff, java_types2.diff

While working on lazy resolution task I've found that 'clss' field is never
cached for TypeDesc struct. VM gurus, could you review the patch and comment it?
